item.title: You Eat It, You Wear It
item.dc:creator: dogkeeper
item.description: Mommy just bought a brand new bra and guess who got to wear it first?…. Bear. He ripped it out of the package tearing the lace. He is shameful because now he has to wear it. Mommy has to get her moneys worth.
item.content:encoded: Mommy just bought a brand new bra and guess who got to wear it first?…. Bear. He ripped it out of the package tearing the lace. He is shameful because now he has to wear it. Mommy has to get her moneys worth.

item.title: “I’ve been a bad bad girl.”
item.dc:creator: dogkeeper
item.description: Ella likes to eat cat poop while listening to Fiona Apple. My seven year daughter thinks adding her photo to this site is a good punishment.
item.content:encoded:
Ella likes to eat cat poop while listening to Fiona Apple.
My seven year daughter thinks adding her photo to this site is a good punishment.

item.title: It’s a dog food buffet on the floor!
item.dc:creator: dogkeeper
item.description: I dumped my food and water all over the kitchen because I was soooo excited to see Mom!
item.content:encoded: I dumped my food and water all over the kitchen because I was soooo excited to see Mom!

item.title: Rocket
item.dc:creator: dogkeeper
item.description: “I beg and whine a lot and I steal food — and I do terrible farts. Also, I have a highly irrational fear of having my paws touched…and I go through the garbage cans. I’m sorry (sort of).” Rocket is our precious five-year-old Hungarian Vizsla. We love him dearly.
item.content:encoded:
“I beg and whine a lot and I steal food — and I do terrible farts. Also, I have a highly irrational fear of having my paws touched…and I go through the garbage cans. I’m sorry (sort of).”
Rocket is our precious five-year-old Hungarian Vizsla. We love him dearly.

item.title: Adoptable Fridays needs submissions!
item.dc:creator: dogkeeper
item.description: We need more submissions! So, if you’ve submitted a picture for Adoptable Fridays and it hasn’t been posted yet and your foster pup still needs a home, please resubmit them here. Make sure your dog has a sign and all appropriate contact info for our readers to find them! If you want to chat with me about Adoptable Friday, you <small>...</small>
item.content:encoded:
We need more submissions! So, if you’ve submitted a picture for Adoptable Fridays and it hasn’t been posted yet and your foster pup still needs a home, please resubmit them here. Make sure your dog has a sign and all appropriate contact info for our readers to find them! If you want to chat with me about Adoptable Friday, you can email me directly at admin@dogshaming.com.

Woof!

Dog Shaming.

item.title: CPAP Mask
item.dc:creator: dogkeeper
item.description: My name is Buzz Lightyear and I ate my dad’s CPAP mask, and I didn’t think anyone would notice. I am a 8 year old Bichon.
item.content:encoded: My name is Buzz Lightyear and I ate my dad’s CPAP mask, and I didn’t think anyone would notice. I am a 8 year old Bichon.

item.title: Donut Dog!
item.dc:creator: dogkeeper
item.description: I go to work with my dad on Fridays, he wasn’t supper please with me today!
item.content:encoded: I go to work with my dad on Fridays, he wasn’t supper please with me today!

item.title: I want my Mommy!
item.dc:creator: dogkeeper
item.description: I suffer from separation anxiety. I tried to dig a hole underneath the door so that I could find my mommy.
item.content:encoded: I suffer from separation anxiety. I tried to dig a hole underneath the door so that I could find my mommy.

item.title: No such thing as indestructible
item.dc:creator: dogkeeper
item.description: Lohki destroyed this indestructible 15$ duck, popped a indestructible ball, and ripped the top off a kong toy. Despite getting at least 1 hour of exercise everyday she still has energy to spare.
item.content:encoded: Lohki destroyed this indestructible 15$ duck, popped a indestructible ball, and ripped the top off a kong toy. Despite getting at least 1 hour of exercise everyday she still has energy to spare.

item.title: Bad Running Buddy…
item.dc:creator: dogkeeper
item.description: This is Quintus. We run 3 times a week and usually it goes great…this time not so much.
item.content:encoded: This is Quintus. We run 3 times a week and usually it goes great…this time not so much.
